Content:: Roger Hamelin (April 27, 1941 - November 25, 2018) was a Canadian football player who played for the Winnipeg Blue Bombers. He won the Grey Cup with them in 1961 and 1962.[1] He is a member of the Football Manitoba Hall of Fame, inducted 2013.[2] He died on November 25, 2018.[3]  This biographical article relating to Canadian football is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
